Posts.Content: Sep 28, 2014 04:54AM Gretta wrote: Hi Eva9310,  I'm an Australian girl who has been doing a lot of research.  MD Anderson comes up a lot, & read an article by a leading oncologist who basically said this treatment gives Her2 pos girls a 97% survival rate. I'm so pleased you girls can get this tx.  Unfortunately, here we can not get this state of the art treatment.  I would have given anything for my docs to do this for me.  We do get Herceptin here but they don't do chemo first which is what I wished for, also BMX begged for that too. I wish you every success with your treatment, from what I've been reading you are in great hands.
